page.title: 11A FRISKNEY WEEKEND
page.content: After school on Friday I watched T.V. On Saturday morning I wore my best clothes to go to my piano lesson. I had my lunch and went with mum to the village jumble sale.I got there and walked around with Sarah Wright. My sister Julia came on her bike later.At the end she had a trick cigarette lighter and she squirted mum with it. At night we all sat round the fire and watched the T.V. Dad was on Juliet Bravo. On Sunday I had my birthday present a day early as dad was going to London on Monday. To my surprise it was a new bike. I was very pleased with it. In the afternoon we went to Gibralter Point. It was great as the wind was strong and the waves were big and rough.I went to bed happy as it was my birthday but sad as it was school the next day.
